slide_content_0: Who's Your Daddy is a casual 1 on 1 video game featuring a clueless father attempting to prevent his infant son from certain death.
slide_title_1: #1: How to Pick up the Poop
slide_content_1: Objective: Throw away the kitchen poops Instruction: Select each poop and drag them to the trash can, where they will disappear on impact. There are 14 poops hidden, all within the kitchen. They are located: In the fruit bowl In front of the fridge In the freezer Inside of the kitchen island (the cabinet below the fruit bowl) The pull-out drawer to the left of the stove Inside of the stove Inside of the microwave On the kitchen counter, to the right of the stove On top of all of the cabinets, in the corner Inside the cabinet above the stacked glasses In the sink In the cabinet below the sink On a dining chair In the corner behind the dining table (by the sliding glass door) .
slide_content_2: Objective: Place the dishes in the kitchen cupboards Instruction: There are 5 plates on the counter, 5 glasses on the counter, and 3 glasses in the sink. One at a time, pick the dishes up and place them into the black cabinets. The glasses are delicate, so take short steps as to not build up too much momentum.
slide_content_3: Objective: Touch the sponge to the car Instruction: The sponge will spawn somewhere in the room. Find it and drag it to the car! The most common spawns are on top of the work table, and in the stacks of tires (behind the car).
slide_title_4: #4: How to Break All the Glass
slide_content_4: Objective: Break all of the shatterable glass Instruction: Jump down to the living room and grab a hammer. You can use this to shatter the glass table in front of you, and the four windows from the master bedroom above. Then, break the five stacked cups in the kitchen, the three in the sink, and the two outside between the lounge chairs.
slide_title_5: #5: How to Knock Down All the Pictures
slide_content_5: Objective: Knock down all of the hung up paintings Instruction: Jump up and down on the paintings to knock them off their hooks. Locations: Kitchen – One desert, one banana, one salt Downstairs bathroom – One salt Living room – One desert, five bananas (going up the stairs) Upstairs hallway – Two bananas Nursery – Two bananas Office – Two bananas, one desert Upstairs bathroom – One banana (use trash can to knock down, if you’re struggling) Master bedroom – Two deserts, one banana .
slide_content_6: Objective: Crash daddy’s car Instruction: Grab the car keys to the right of the garage door Enter the vehicle Put the keys in the ignition Shift gears Turn off parking brake Press the gas pedal! .
slide_title_7: #7: How to Get the Limo (Limosuine Car)
slide_content_7: First of all the new Tv studio has a few great features. But thats the target your looking for. Enter the elavator to next floor then enter the next elavator to next floor until you reach the Wobbly Quiz floor. Enter the room on the left thats next to the double doors for the Wobbly quiz. Once you entered, pull out the Wobbly quiz poster and then a button will be behind it. Push that button and then the elavator button for 3rd or 4th floor of the studio will be activated enter elavator again and push up button for next floor and then you will see an office for the manager I think. Enter the room and get the present and then boom you have it.
slide_title_8: #8: How to How to Get the Rocket Car
slide_content_8: How to Find the Car First off, let’s find out where to start. Right, you will be spawned in the world once you enter a game right here, out side the house you were kicked from for being a bit lazy playing video game. Now, lets *Cough* *Cough* Borrow a car. Follow the positions I go. The super market. Over the bridge. Near the fair ground.
slide_content_9: To get the Hamster ball head ball to the lab and go to the shrinking mashing then after your shrunk you go to the pile a box’s a climb then the the fan and then jump down the crack next to you. You then will find a button behind a gap in the box’s squeeze threw the gap (this may take multiple attempts) and push the button then reset. After that go back to the fan and it’ll be turned off go into the vents and the hamster balls will be there.
slide_title_10: How to get the jet pack alien suit in Wobbly Life
slide_content_10: How get the jet pack // alien suit? 1) You need to start pizza job after 12am (only this hour) 2)Afrer this job starts w/o timer and UFO will appear. 3)All you have to do just follow the damn UFO and deliver pizza to aliens 4)Once thats been completed you'll unlock the alien outfit that will have the jetpack How to equippe suit? You can equippe suit in in each cupboard marked on the map Congratulations! Now you can fly and be green guy like crazy frog 👽
slide_title_11: How To Get Toxic Waste Car
slide_content_11: The Toxic Waste Car is found in Gooey Louie\'s home inside one of the powerplant\'s chimneys. While the Waste Disposal job is in progress Louie moves to the feeding point at the quarry, revealing a small pile of barrels. Interact with them to unlock it.
slide_content_12: Each part is found in a chest within the Temple Puzzles. The first is in the chest immediately on the left in the room the player enters after the hidden path puzzle. The second is down the left path of the maze in a dead end. The third is the opposite side of the memory pattern puzzle room from which the player enters.
slide_content_13: Take the glowing orb from the Temple Puzzles back out the start and the glowing orb from the Waterfall Puzzles into the Mining job. Behind an ore block down in the tunnels are pedestals to put both orbs. The game remembers when one is placed and when the door opens it remains open. Inside the room is a gravestone that must be put through the processor and carted away before the job timer runs out. This then unlocks the pet for purchase.
slide_content_14: Inside the Mountain Lab while small in the Shrinking Machine Lab find all the missing scientists around the room and the UFO key. Complete the middle table platforming. Zipline from the middle table to the lazer maze table and reach the other side. Complete the plank and nail platforming and reach the computer table. Complete the computer puzzle and ride the robot arm to the where the UFO key is.
